      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Server.ClientHandler
      instantiate threads that listen to the socket that connects to the client and acts accordingly upon response.
      (package private) class  Server.NewClientListener
      Instantiate s thread thats job is to wait on the server's port for new clients.
